alert.note: Alert for McPherson; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 2:36PM CST until December 15 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CST FOR MCPHERSON AND SALINE COUNTIES... At 235 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Delphos to Windom, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Salina, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Assaria, Gypsum, Brookville, Smolan, Windom, New Cambria, Falun, Salina Airport, Mcpherson Airport, Roxbury, Bridgeport and Kipp. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across central Kansas. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
